name: aria-sentiment-analysis
description: Multi-dimensional sentiment analysis — valence/arousal/dominance, lexicon+LLM blend, conversation trajectory, adaptive tone profiles
author: Aria Team

tools.name: analyze_message
tools.description: Analyze sentiment of a single message — returns valence, arousal, dominance, frustration, satisfaction, confusion, and tone recommendation.

context.description: Optional list of prior messages for context

store.description: Store result in semantic memory (default: true)

tools.name: analyze_conversation
tools.description: Analyze sentiment trajectory of a full conversation — detects improving/declining/volatile patterns, turning points, resolution.

messages.description: List of message dicts with 'role' and 'content' keys

store.description: Store summary in semantic memory (default: true)

tools.name: get_tone_recommendation
tools.description: Get adaptive tone recommendation (empathetic/step-by-step/celebratory/neutral) for a message based on its sentiment.

text.description: Text to get tone recommendation for

tools.name: get_sentiment_history
tools.description: Return recent sentiment analysis results from session memory and semantic storage.
